認.definition: to recognize; to know; to admit

認人.definition: to recognize people (of babies); to be able to tell people apart

認人兒.definition: erhua variant of 認人|认人[ren4 ren2]

認作.definition: to regard as; to view; to consider sth as; to treat as

認同.definition: to approve of; to endorse; to acknowledge; to recognize; to identify oneself with

認命.definition: to accept misfortunes as decreed by fate; to be resigned to sth

認字.definition: to learn to read; able to read; literate

認定.definition: to maintain (that sth is true); to determine (a fact); determination (of an amount); of the firm opinion; to believe firmly; to set one's mind on; to identify with

認床.definition: to have difficulties sleeping in a bed other than one's own

認得.definition: to recognize; to remember sth (or sb) on seeing it; to know

認死理兒.definition: erhua variant of 認死理|认死理[ren4 si3 li3]

認清.definition: to see clearly; to recognize; to realize

認準.definition: to identify clearly; to make sure of; to believe firmly

認為.definition: to believe; to think; to consider; to feel

認真.definition: conscientious; earnest; serious; to take seriously; to take to heart

認知.definition: cognition; cognitive; understanding; perception; awareness; to be cognizant of; to recognize; to realize

認知神經心理學.pinyin: ren4 zhi1 shen2 jing1 xin1 li3 xue2

認罪.definition: to admit guilt; to plead guilty

認腳.definition: (of a shoe) designed to be worn on a specific foot – either the left or the right

認腳鞋.definition: a left-and-right pair of shoes (distinguished from 直腳鞋|直脚鞋[zhi2jiao3xie2], shoes that can be worn on either foot)

認親.definition: to acknowledge sb as one's relative; to acknowledge kinship; (old) to visit new in-laws after a marriage

認識.definition: to know; to recognize; to be familiar with; to get acquainted with sb; knowledge; understanding; awareness; cognition

認識論.definition: epistemology (in philosophy, the theory of how we know things)

認賊作父.definition: lit. to acknowledge the bandit as one's father (idiom); fig. a complete betrayal; to sell oneself to the enemy

認賠.definition: to agree to pay compensation; to accept liability

認賬.definition: to own up to a fault; to admit the truth; to acknowledge a debt

認購.definition: to undertake to purchase sth; to subscribe (to share issue)

認錯.definition: to admit an error; to acknowledge one's mistake

認雞作鳳.definition: lit. to mistake a chicken for a phoenix (idiom); fig. to overestimate sth's worth

認領.definition: to claim (as one's property); to adopt (a child); to accept (an illegitimate child as one's own)

認頭.definition: to admit defeat; to accept having lost

認養.definition: to sponsor; to adopt (pledge to give sb or sth one's special attention or support); to adopt (choose to raise a child or animal as one's own)
